chat_history.message:
Hello,

I bought the iPhone 13 mini but I'm having trouble with the battery life. Therefore, I would like to exchange the device for a new one. The device has not been damaged during use and it has never fallen. It was always used with a screen protector and phone case. I hope you understand.

Best regards!

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased in EXCELLENT condition, which indicates that it is free of scratches according to the Quality Charter. As seen from the pictures attached, the device has scratches upon return. 
The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a 60 euros deduction is reasonable. Kindly confirm with the customer if this is agreeable.
Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile,

Please initiate a full refund within the next 24 working hours.

You may not deduct anything from the refund.

Otherwise, we will initiate the refund.

Thank You.

Regards,
Luciana from the Back Care Team

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

As mentioned, the device was purchased in EXCELLENT condition, which indicates that it is free of scratches according to the Quality Charter. As seen from the pictures attached, the device has scratches upon return.
The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

However, to provide a satisfactory outcome for the customer, we are amenable to a 50 euros deduction instead. Kindly confirm with the customer if this is agreeable.
Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Please initiate a full refund within the next 24 working hours.

You may not deduct anything from the refund.

Otherwise, we will initiate the refund.Deadline for REFUND are 06.06.2024

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Rosa Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The customer wants a refund but as mentioned, the device was purchased in EXCELLENT condition, which indicates that it is free of scratches according to the Quality Charter. As seen from the pictures attached, the device has scratches upon return.

The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition. We are therefore unable to offer a full refund for this order. 

However, to provide a satisfactory outcome for the customer, we are amenable to a 50 euros deduction instead. Kindly confirm with the customer if this is agreeable. They would receive a partial refund of 340.54 euros
Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

I have escalated this case to our experts for evaluation, and we will inform you of the outcome.

Regards,
Rosa from the Back Care Team

Hello ecomobile,

as a response to the analysis,  I was informed that you can only  deduct something from the refund for the missing accessories.

So activate the refund in full within 24 hours, or we'll do it for you.

Thank you for understanding,
Rosa from Back Market

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist mit Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the device seems to be locked with a code. Kindly assist us in resolving this issue in order for us to proceed. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile,

are you talking about hi iCloud access code? 
Please indicate the IMEI so we can check and help the customer if it is iCloud!

Thank you for understanding,
Rosa from Back Market

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message regarding the code lock, we have resolved the issue.

However, as mentioned, the device was purchased in EXCELLENT condition, which indicates that it is free of scratches according to the Quality Charter. As seen from the pictures attached, the device has scratches upon return.

The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition. We are therefore unable to offer a full refund for this order.

However, to provide a satisfactory outcome for the customer, we are amenable to a 50 euros deduction instead. Kindly confirm with the customer if this is agreeable. They would receive a partial refund of 340.54 euros
Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

According to our message to you on 06.06.24, 17:04 , we have now activated the refund for your client.

Thank you for understanding,
Rosa from Back Market
